title: Measurement Metric Type
description: Metric types produced by measurement agents. Terminology aligns with Google Meridian and Meta Robyn conventions.

enumDescriptions.incremental_conversions: Conversions causally attributed to advertising exposure
enumDescriptions.incremental_revenue: Revenue causally attributed to advertising exposure
enumDescriptions.incremental_roas: Incremental return on ad spend (incremental revenue / spend)
enumDescriptions.mroi: Marginal ROI — expected return from the next dollar of spend at current levels
enumDescriptions.cpik: Cost per incremental KPI — spend required to generate one additional outcome
enumDescriptions.channel_contribution: Channel's share of total measured outcome (0-1)
enumDescriptions.brand_lift: Change in brand awareness, consideration, or purchase intent
enumDescriptions.search_lift: Incremental search volume attributed to advertising exposure
enumDescriptions.foot_traffic_lift: Incremental physical store visits attributed to advertising exposure
enumDescriptions.custom: Provider-specific metric not covered by standard types
